channel.title: 508 help please?
channel.description:
1.) Where do I go to add shops in a 508 server? 2.) Where do I go to add commands in a 508 server? 3.) I went into Login.Java and changed the name to my name so I would be admin and then I compiled it... but when I run the server it doesn't give me a crown... 4.) Where do I goto the start up place(where it says click here to play, right after you login), and when it sarts up a menu pops up but I don't want it to.
THANKS!!

item.title: 508 help please?
item.dc:creator: @Magnite7 Magnite7
item.description:
@Magnite7 wrote:

ok ty, but where would i place the shophandler when i make it

Read full topic

item.title: 508 help please?
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

1.) The shop handler you need to make yourself. 508’s dont have it. And yes, it would be pretty complicated.
2.) src>Rs2>palidino76>Io>Packets>Commands.java

Read full topic

item.title: 508 help please?
item.dc:creator: @Magnite7 Magnite7
item.description:
@Magnite7 wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:2, topic:237387”]Answers-
1.) You would need to create a Shophandler which only few have.
2.) Commands.java
3.) Make sure you spelled your name with no capitol letters in Login.java. Reset the server after compile.
4.) Search for what the menu says in your Commands.java or Login.java and delete the code.[/quote]Oh!!
Ok thank you very much…
1.) where would the shop handler be located at, what folder?
2.) again where would that be at becuase the508 i have has like 40 folders. =/
3.) now i see what i did wrong… i had a capital
4.) ok

Read full topic

item.title: 508 help please?
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Answers-
1.) You would need to create a Shophandler which only few have.
2.) Commands.java
3.) Make sure you spelled your name with no capitol letters in Login.java. Reset the server after compile.
4.) Search for what the menu says in your Commands.java or Login.java and delete the code.

Read full topic
